title: JPMorgan’s Jamie Dimon Has Converted to Crypto Believer: $BEST to Soar Next?
description: Jamie Dimon just went from branding Bitcoin a “fraud” to calling himself a “believer” in stablecoins. This, in another institutional change of heart that could see leading crypto wallets’ native $BEST token explode in the near future. Dimon’s shift isn’t smal…
